meaningMnemonic: Shoot a <radical>shellfish</radical> that's in the <radical>mouth</radical> of a <radical>Viking</radical> at the fair and you'll win a <kanji>prize</kanji>. The game is to shoot the shellfish in the Viking's mouth and knock it over.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>prize</kanji> you're working so hard to win is lunch with the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). This is a pretty huge prize, considering all you're doing is knocking something over.
